data.title: Payment Alliance International Acquires B & B Music ATM Portfolio
data.description: LOUISVILLE, Ky.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- #ATM--Payment Alliance International has acquired B & B Music’s ATM portfolio, adding more than 720 ATMs to the nationwide fleet it services and supports.

data.title: Bitcoin surpasses $38,000 for first time, lifts cryptocurrency market value above $1 trillion
data.description: In the early hours of Thursday, the digital coin hit an all time high of $38,169 by rising 6 percent and quadrupled in the past year. The digital currency was trading above $35,000 for the first time in Asia on Wednesday, rising to a high of $35,879.
data.content:
Digital currency Bitcoin hit an all time high of $38,000 per unit after a frenzied rally on Thursday, taking the cryptocurrency market above the $1 trillion mark for the first time ever.
